featured.text: Research shows that consuming a minimum of 25 grams of soy protein a day can lower blood cholesterol levels in people with high cholesterol problems.

definition.zh_def: 克，一種質量單位，等於千分之一千克。
definition.en_def: A unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
definition.example: The recipe calls for 200 grams of flour.
